title: Lag for first minute
body:
Hey guys,

Is anyone else having an issue where the game will lag (like maybe a second delay) for the first minute or so (usually until minions reach tower) and then stop?  The rest of the game is perfectly fine but happens every single game?

I have VDSL net on a Custom built PC: GTX1070, Core-i7 Xtreme 6Core processor 32 GB RAM (So it's not my computer or internet)

Thanks.
